void.string:
-- EXPORT DATABASE SCHEMA/FILES --
-- Read env variables from config-file WbVarDef -file=tmp/pwb.ini; -- User input -- WbSysExec -program='python3' -argument='"$[pwb_path]/extract_user_input.py"' -env="PATH=$[py_path]"; -- Read user variables from config-file WbVarDef -file=tmp/pwb.ini; -- create base directories WbSysExec -ifEmpty=quit -program='python3' -argument='"$[pwb_path]/extract_sip_paths.py"' -env="PATH=$[py_path]"; -- Read user variables from config-file WbVarDef -file=tmp/pwb.ini; -- Check connection WbConfirm -ifNotEmpty=db_args -message="Is database connection correct?" -yesText="Yes, run command" -noText="No, stop"; -- Create schemareport WbInclude -ifNotEmpty=db_args -file=PWB/sqlwb/WbSchemaReport.sql -displayResult=true -verbose=true -continueOnError=false; -- Export to tsv -- TODO: Vil virke også med LONG RAW på oracle (bug i oracle jdbc-driver) hvis det feltet er listet sist i tabellen -> fikse auto hvordan? WbExport -ifNotEmpty=db_args -type=text -schema=$[db_schema] -types=TABLE,SYNONYM -sourceTable=* -outputdir=../_DATA/$[sys_name]/content/sub_systems/$[subsys_name]/content/data -createDir=true -continueOnError=false -encoding=UTF8 -header=true -decimal='.' -maxDigits=0 -- export as many decimals as possible -lineEnding=lf -clobAsFile=true -- export huge text fields as separate files -blobType=file -- export binary fields as separate files -delimiter=\t -- tab-separated -replaceExpression='(\n|\r\n|\r|\t|^$)' -replaceWith=' ' -- To space heller? -nullString=' ' -- Endre til 'NULL'? -showProgress=10000; -- Create archives from directories WbSysExec -ifNotEmpty=subsys_name -program='python3' -argument='"$[pwb_path]/extract_wim_capture.py"' -env="PATH=$[py_path]";
Package all data and generate checksum
Copy data to processing folder and backup

-- Define variables -- -- WbVarDef Filepath=$[?Filepath]; ----------------------
-- TODO: Bytt ut med python-variant under -- Show checksum for file -- WbSysExec ..\md5\md5.exe $[Filepath]; ----------------------------
